properties.areaDesc: Jefferson, AL; Walker, AL; Tuscaloosa, AL
properties.headline: Flood Warning issued February 9 at 10:52AM CST until February 13 at 11:21AM CST by NWS Birmingham AL
properties.description:
...The National Weather Service in Birmingham AL has issued a Flood
Warning for the following rivers in Alabama...

Locust Fork At Sayre Affecting Jefferson...Tuscaloosa and Walker
Counties.

.A new Flood Warning for Locust Fork at Sayre has been issued due to
new forecast rainfall amounts between 4 and 6 inches through the day
on Tuesday. Additional heavy rainfall is possible through the end of
this upcoming week which will cause water levels to remain elevated.
Interests should closely monitor the latest river forecasts through
the upcoming week.

The National Weather Service in Birmingham AL has issued a

* Flood Warning for
the Locust Fork At Sayre.
* from Tuesday morning to Thursday morning...or until the warning is
cancelled.
* At 10:00 AM Sunday The stage Was 18.5 feet.
* Flood stage is 25 feet.
* Minor flooding is forecast.
* Forecast...rise above flood stage by Tuesday morning and continue
to rise to near 31.2 feet by Wednesday morning. The river will fall
below flood stage by Wednesday night.
* Impact...At 25 feet...Flooding of low lying wood lands and
agricultural lands along the Locust Fork occurs.
properties.instruction:
Do not drive cars through flooded areas.  Turn Around...Don't Drown.

Another statement will be issued by Monday morning...or sooner if
conditions warrant.
